pr_title: Consume Automation Logger & Add rule to dump MSAL logs to its own file

timeline.message: Consume separate logging rules for msal and automation
Disable logcat log for msal (during ui automation) - just dump to file only
Use file appender to dump msal logs during automation

timeline.bodyText: nit: if you converted the level first, or used a function to do it, there would only be one call to msialfilelogappender.
